content: You Who Give Little and Take Much
My Master  showed me this vision: A bowl of fresh fruit.
He said, “What do you see, Amos?”I said, “A bowl of fresh, ripe fruit.” said, “Right. So, I’m calling it quits with my people Israel. I’m no longer acting as if everything is just fine.”
“The royal singers will wail when it happens.”
“Corpses will be strewn here, there, and everywhere.
